comments.name: Sarah L.
comments.text: I almost fell for his scheme too! He used the same investment pitch with me. Thankfully I saw this website first. Stay strong everyone.
comments.title: Crypto Scam Warning

comments.name: David K.
comments.text: The authorities have been notified about this scammer. If you've been affected, please file a police report and reference case #25783.
comments.title: Ponzi Scheme Exposed

comments.name: Michelle T.
comments.text: I lost money to this person last month. I've joined the victim support group that meets virtually every Tuesday. It's helped me cope with the shame and anger. DM me if you want details.
comments.title: POP MART Scam
